comments.author: bholley@mozilla.com
comments.creator: bholley@mozilla.com
comments.raw_text:
See the thread here:

http://groups.google.com/group/mozilla.dev.tech.js-engine.internals/browse_thread/thread/d8a20c15350bf0bf#

This is what the resulting patch looks like: https://github.com/bholley/mozilla-central/tree/spidermonkey_multiline_brace

It sounds like people are ok with landing this once there are no other big pending patches in the pipe. Bill, can you ping me back once you've landed your write barriers patch?

comments.text: Today we had a small discussion that resulted in consensus.  See the last sentence+example: https://wiki.mozilla.org/JavaScript:SpiderMonkey:C%2B%2B_Coding_Style#Conditionals.
